noTournament: There is not any tournament created.
errorTournament: Unexpected error when reading tournament information.

disableMonitor: This option is incompatible with the score monitor. Please, do not use it if this option if you select this option.
databaseConnectionFailure: Communications link failure with the database server!

repeatedFight: There is a repeated match in the tournament.
manualChampionshipHelp: Select a source teams group and the address teams group for creating the winners cross.
storeDataError: Error when trying to store some data in the database.
deleteDataError: Error when trying to remove some data in the database.
genericError: An unknown error has occurred when trying to do the operation.
emptyPdfError: The generated document is empty. Please, review the selected options.
importFail: An error has occurred when trying to import the data.
convertToCustomized: Do you want to define as customized the selected tournament?
userWithoutRole: The selected person is not enrolled in the tournament.
saveRequired: Matches must be saved into the database to proceed. Do you want to save them now?

waitingConnection: Waiting database response. Check the network connection.
passwordDoesNotMatch: The inserted password does not match!
invalidDatabase: The destination database is not valid. Probably from an old version of the software.
invalidEmail: Please provide a valid email address
name: Name
loopHint: Loop or Satori shiai without rest. Each competitor faces each other consecutively.
leagueHint: All versus all. Saotori shiai or round-robin tournament.
addTeamToTournament: Add new team to the league
blockedUserError: Too many attempts! Try it later.
backendError: Cannot connect with the backend! Please, check your deployment.
deleteFightsWarning: This action will erase all previous matches stored for this tournament. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteFightWarning: This action will delete the selected match ({{team1}} vs {{team2}}). Are you sure you want to continue?
disablePopUpBlocker: Please disable your Pop-up blocker and try again.
addFightMessage: The match has been added correctly.
classicHint: Winner is obtained by won matches, and if there is a tie on the number of matches, by the won fights. Also if there is another tie, hits are taken into account. Draw matches or fights are ignored.
europeanHint: Winner is obtained by won matches. If there is a tie, then draw matches are counted. If there is also a tie we use the same procedure with duels. If matches and duels won are also a tie, hits are counted.
internationalHint: Winner is obtained by won matches. If there is a tie, then draw matches are counted. If there is also a tie we count the won fights. If still there is a tie, first count the number of hits and if the tie is not solved, count the draw fights.
customHint: You can define custom values for your tournament
win_over_drawsHint: Victory is calculated by the total of won matches. If there is a tie, duels won are counted. Is still there is a tie, hits are counted. On the case there is still a tie, draw matches are counted and later draw duels if needed.
invalidPasswordError: Password must be a combination of lower-case, upper-case, numbers and at least 8 characters long.
errorUserAlreadyExists: User with this username already exists!
timerResetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset the time?
logoutWarning: Are you sure you want to log out?
maximizeFights: Generate the maximum number of matches.
maximizeFightsHint: All teams will fight against all other teams if this option is selected.
elementInUse: This element is in use elsewhere and cannot be changed
oldestEliminatedHint: The team that is fighting for a longer time is eliminated.
newestEliminatedHint: The team that is fighting for a shorten time is eliminated.
infoPictureStored: The picture has been stored and assigned to the participant.
invalidFileSize: Only files with a size between {{minSize}} B and {{maxSize}} MB are allowed.
affectionHint: Time used for scoring against you.
errorFightNotSelected: You must select a group first

billyTheKid.title: Billy the Kid
billyTheKid.description: Perform the quickest point in a tournament.
billyTheKid.bronze: Achieved for at least two consecutive tournaments.
billyTheKid.silver: Achieved for at least three consecutive tournaments.
billyTheKid.gold: Achieved for at least five consecutive tournaments.

lethalWeapon.title: Lethal Weapon
lethalWeapon.description: Perform a point in less than 5 seconds.
lethalWeapon.bronze: Achieved for at least three tournaments.
lethalWeapon.silver: Achieved for at least five tournaments.
lethalWeapon.gold: Achieved for at least seven tournaments.

terminator.title: Terminator T-800
terminator.description: Perform the maximum possible points at a tournament.
terminator.bronze: Exterminate everybody in two consecutive tournaments.
terminator.silver: Exterminate everybody in three consecutive tournaments.
terminator.gold: Exterminate everybody in five consecutive tournaments.

juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
juggernaut.description: Perform the maximum possible points in a tournament and nobody has scored against you.
juggernaut.normal: Be a Juggernaut in one tournament.
juggernaut.bronze: Be a Juggernaut in two tournaments.
juggernaut.silver: Be a Juggernaut in three tournaments.
juggernaut.gold: Be a Juggernaut in five tournaments.

theKing.title: The King
theKing.description: Be the one that last longer on the King of the Mountain mode.
theKing.normal: Be the king in one tournament.
theKing.bronze: Be the king in three tournaments during the same year.
theKing.silver: Be the king in four tournaments during the same year.
theKing.gold: Be the king in five tournaments during the same year.

looksGoodFromFarAwayBut.title: Looks good from far away but...
looksGoodFromFarAwayBut.normal: Be an organizer in one tournament.
looksGoodFromFarAwayBut.bronze: Be a organizer in three consecutive tournaments.
looksGoodFromFarAwayBut.silver: Be a organizer in five consecutive tournaments.
looksGoodFromFarAwayBut.gold: Be a organizer in seven consecutive tournaments.

iLoveTheFlags.title: I love the flags
iLoveTheFlags.normal: Be a referee in one tournament.
iLoveTheFlags.bronze: Be a referee in three consecutive tournaments.
iLoveTheFlags.silver: Be a referee in five consecutive tournaments.
iLoveTheFlags.gold: Be a referee in seven consecutive tournaments.

theCastle.title: The Castle
theCastle.description: Avoid that anybody perform a point against you.
theCastle.normal: Protect the castle in one tournament.
theCastle.bronze: Protect the castle in two consecutive tournaments.
theCastle.silver: Protect the castle in three consecutive tournaments.
theCastle.gold: Protect the castle in five consecutive tournaments.

entrenched.title: Entrenched
entrenched.description: Perform no points in a tournament but also nobody has scored against you.
entrenched.normal: Protect the trench for one tournament.
entrenched.bronze: Protect the trench for two consecutive tournaments.
entrenched.silver: Protect the trench for three consecutive tournaments.
entrenched.gold: Protect the trench for five consecutive tournaments.

aLittleOfEverything.title: A little of everything
aLittleOfEverything.description: Perform different points in a tournament. This achievement can be obtained multiple times.
aLittleOfEverything.normal: Score a Men, Kote and Do in one tournament.
aLittleOfEverything.bronze: Score a Men, Kote, Do and Tsuki in one tournament.
aLittleOfEverything.silver: Score a Men, Kote, Do, Tsuki and Hansoku in one tournament.
aLittleOfEverything.gold: Score a Men, Kote, Do, Tsuki, Hansoku and Ippon/Fusen-gachi in one tournament.

boneBreaker.title: Bone breaker
boneBreaker.description: Lose a fight by two Hansokus.

sweatyTenugui.title: Sweaty tenugi
sweatyTenugui.description: Participate in a tournament as a competitor.
sweatyTenugui.normal: Participate in your first tournament as a competitor.
sweatyTenugui.bronze: Participate in ten tournaments as a competitor.
sweatyTenugui.silver: Participate in twenty tournaments as a competitor.
sweatyTenugui.gold: Participate in thirty tournaments as a competitor.

theWinner.title: The winner
theWinner.description: Be the first on a tournament.
theWinner.bronze: Win three tournaments during the same year.
theWinner.silver: Win four tournaments during the same year.
theWinner.gold: Win five tournaments during the same year.

theWinnerTeam.title: The winner team
theWinnerTeam.description: Be a member of a team that is the first on a tournament.
theWinnerTeam.normal: Be in a team that wins a tournament.
theWinnerTeam.bronze: Be in a winner team in three tournaments during the same year.
theWinnerTeam.silver: Be in a winner team in four tournaments during the same year.
theWinnerTeam.gold: Be in a winner team in five tournaments during the same year.

woodcutter.title: Woodcutter
woodcutter.description: Score only 'Do' points, and score at least one 'Do' on each fight.
woodcutter.bronze: Score only 'Do' in two consecutive tournaments.
woodcutter.silver: Score only 'Do' in three consecutive tournaments.
woodcutter.gold: Score only 'Do' in five consecutive tournaments.

theNeverEndingStory.title: The never ending story
theNeverEndingStory.description: Be a member for a long period and still keep participating.
theNeverEndingStory.normal: Be a member for five years.
theNeverEndingStory.bronze: Be a member for ten years.
theNeverEndingStory.silver: Be a member for fifteen years.
theNeverEndingStory.gold: Be a member for twenty years.

loveSharing.title: Love sharing
loveSharing.normal: Be a volunteer in one tournament.
loveSharing.bronze: Be a volunteer in three consecutive tournaments.
loveSharing.silver: Be a volunteer in five consecutive tournaments.
loveSharing.gold: Be a volunteer in seven consecutive tournaments.

masterTheLoop.title: Master the loop
masterTheLoop.bronze: Master the loop in three tournaments during the same year.
masterTheLoop.silver: Master the loop in four tournaments during the same year.
masterTheLoop.gold: Master the loop in five tournaments during the same year.

tisButAScratch.title: 'Tis but a scratch
tisButAScratch.description: Receive a point from your adversary.
tisButAScratch.gold: Receive your first one hundred hits.

firstBlood.title: First Blood
firstBlood.description: Score a point to an adversary.
firstBlood.gold: Score your first one hundred points.

daruma.title: Daruma
daruma.description: Attend as much as possible tournaments.

stormtrooperSyndrome.title: Stormtrooper Syndrome
stormtrooperSyndrome.description: A team miss all points on a tournament.
stormtrooperSyndrome.bronze: Achieved for at least two consecutive tournaments.
stormtrooperSyndrome.silver: Achieved for at least three consecutive tournaments.
stormtrooperSyndrome.gold: Achieved for at least five consecutive tournaments.

vForVendetta.title: V For Vendetta
vForVendetta.description: Win a fight when your opponent has scored on the first place.
vForVendetta.bronze: Achieved for at least two consecutive tournaments.
vForVendetta.silver: Achieved for at least three consecutive tournaments.
vForVendetta.gold: Achieved for at least five consecutive tournaments.

sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.title: Sith apprentices always kill their master
sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.description: Win a fight when you have always lost previously against your opponent.
sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.normal: Win when you have already lost two times against your opponent.
sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.bronze: Win when you have already lost three times against your opponent.
sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.silver: Win when you have already lost four times against your opponent.
sithApprenticesAlwaysKillTheirMaster.gold: Win when you have already lost five times against your opponent.

drawScore: There is some draw scores that must be resolved before passing to the next tournament phase.
leagueFifo: First team will be the first out when generating the next match.
leagueFifoHint: When generating the fights, on the first one selects the team that is replaced. If true, the first team will be replaced by the third one. If false, the second will be replaced by the third one. As an example, if it is selected for teams 1, 2 and 3, the fights will be: '1-2, 3-2, 3-1'. But if not, will be: '1-2, 1-3, 2-3.
tournamentCloneWarning: You are going to duplicate the tournament. Are you sure to continue?
tournamentListAsZip: Download all PDF lists in a zip file
qrCodeHint: Displays a QR code that allows guests to track tournament scores.

backendMessage.achievementGenerated: A total of {{achievementsNumber}} achievements have been generated for tournament '{{tournamentName}}'.
backendMessage.achievementAllGenerated: A total of {{achievementsNumber}} achievements have been generated for {{tournamentNumber}} tournaments.

oddFightsResolvedAsap: Resolve team byes as soon as possible
oddFightsResolvedAsapHint: If the number of teams or groups in the tournament is odd, it is possible that during the matches some teams do not have associated matches and qualify for the next phase automatically (byes). With this option you ensure that byes are resolved as soon as possible.
